name: Dungeon64 (Renosance Games)
description:
Dungeon64

Created for LOWREZJAM22

Fight Dangerous Foes!

Find Fabulous Treasure!

Die!

How To Play

First of all: Press M at any time to mute the music.

Left click to select a unit. While a unit is selected left click on a highlighted tile to move or a targeted enemy to attack. Each unit can attack once per turn. Click the button in the bottom right to end your turn.

You will get a randomized party of adventurers. The goal is to get as deep into the dungeon as you can. The three classes of adventurers are:

  • Paladin who full heals at the end of every turn
  • Archer who has long range attacks
  • Wizard whose attacks chain to the sides and up and down

Between each fight you will be given two items to choose from. You can equip these on any of your heroes. They give boosts to the following stats:

  Damage how many HP of damage they do with an attack

  Health how much damage they can take before death

  Movement how far they can move

  Range how far away they can attack

As you get lower the items you get will become stronger but so will the monsters! Good luck!

The current lowest depth we have gotten to is 9. Let us know if you beat that and what party/items you had!

There Are Bugs!

There is plenty of wonky janky stuff going on. If you run into an issue leave a comment. Particularly anything to do with necromancer/wizard interactions can be... strange. But such is the nature of magic.

Credits

Liam Dyer - Programming, Art, Music

Matt Miller - Programming, Art

Jacob Dyer - Design, Playtesting

Dave Hammarstedt - Programming, Design, Playtesting

Dungeon Tileset a recolor of Minifantasy Dungeon 

This game is open source
